data.message: Em, on internet I founded an advice that said that shadyxv will be your last cd, and then u will stop making rap... please, tell me that it's not true... please... I hate my family and the unic thing that make me better is your rap... U cannot go away... not now... noone want that... please... and come to Italy!!! We need you!!! The rap in Italy is a shit... you're the legend... you're the rap god!!! We love you!!!
